divs: Sighting DetailsI see a glowing red ball while I was driving, others pulled over to see I then seen another travelling in same direction I then realized i had a video camera and pulled over and filmed it. Glowing ball of light that did not ascend in elevation like that of a fire lantern. Caught the second one on film it came from over upper deck restaurant. I zoomed up and it distorted the image, a car goes by the object was treetop level. The time on my car clock is 6 minutes fast. I was hanging out my window hence the poor video.
Summary: saw a glowing red ball while I was driving, others pulled over to see I then seen another travelling in same direction I then realized i had a video camera and pulled over and filmed it. Glowing ball of light that did not asend in elevation
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Weeki Wachee
There were no other sightings in Weeki Wachee on or around July 4th 2013
